title: Beet Leaf Pesto
summary: You can never have too many condiment recipes, so give Beet Leaf Pesto a try. This recipe serves 1. One portion of this dish contains about 20g of protein, 35g of fat, and a total of 499 calories. For $1.47 per serving, this recipe covers 24% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 5 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of sea salt and coarsely-ground pepper, garlic clove, a heavy sprinkle of milk parmasan, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 82%. This score is tremendous. Try Moroccan Beet Leaf or Swiss Chard Salad (Salade de Blettes), Beet Rice & Garlicky Kale Bowls with Beet Green Pesto, and Fava Leaf Pesto for similar recipes.
